Cogs Gold Rank Watch
Montre du rang Or de Cogs
Cogs Gold-Rang-Uhr
Orologio “Gold Rank” di Cogs
Reloj del nivel Oro de Cogs
코그 골드 등급 시계 (여성)
Cogs Gold Rank Watch (Women)
齒輪黃金等級手錶(女用)
齒輪黃金等級手錶(女用)
Cogs Gold Rank Watch
kDesc
Congratulations! You've reached Gold rank in Cogs, by achieving a score of over 12000! To commemorate the occasion, here is a gold cog wristwatch. Wear it with pride! [#Legal]

Félicitations ! Vous avez atteint le rang Or de Cogs, en réalisant un score supérieur à 12 000 points ! Pour célébrer cela, voici une montre-bracelet en or à crémaillère. Portez-la avec fierté ! [#Legal]
Herzlichen Glückwunsch! Mit einer Punktzahl von 12000 hast du bei Cogs den Gold-Rang erreicht! Aufgrund dieses Erfolges erhältst du diese goldene Cog-Armbanduhr. Trag sie mit Stolz! [#Legal]

Congratulazioni! Hai raggiunto il livello d’Oro in Cogs, ottenendo un punteggio pari ad almeno 12.000 punti! Per celebrare questo evento ti regaliamo un orologio da polso d’Oro. Indossalo con orgoglio! [#Legal]
¡Enhorabuena, has alcanzado el nivel Oro en Cogs al lograr una puntuación superior a 12.000 puntos! Para celebrarlo, aquí tienes un reloj de pulsera de oro. ¡Llévalo con orgullo! [#Legal]
축하합니다, 12000점 이상의 점수를 기록하여 코그에서 골드 등급을 획득했습니다! 당신의 실력을 기념하기 위하여 황금으로 제작된 코그 손목 시계를 증정합니다. 자랑스럽게 착용하세요! [#Legal]
Congratulations! You've reached Gold rank in Cogs, by achieving a score of over 12000! To commemorate the occasion, here is a gold cog wristwatch. Wear it with pride! [#Legal]
恭喜您在「齒輪王」遊戲得分稱過12000分並獲得黃金等級！為了紀念這一刻，我們特別獻上這個黃金齒輪手錶。戴上它以自豪吧！[#Legal]
恭喜您在「齒輪王」遊戲得分稱過12000分並獲得黃金等級！為了紀念這一刻，我們特別獻上這個黃金齒輪手錶。戴上它以自豪吧！[#Legal]
Congratulations! You've reached Gold rank in Cogs, by achieving a score of over 12000! To commemorate the occasion, here is a gold cog wristwatch. Wear it with pride! [#Legal]
